18#include "QRCodecMode.h"
19#include "QRVersion.h"
20
21#include <stdexcept>
22
23namespace ZXing {
24namespace QRCode {
25
26namespace {
27
28static const int CHAR_COUNT_PER_MODE[] = {
29 0, 0, 0,
30 10, 12, 14,
31 9, 11, 13,
32 0, 0, 0,
33 8, 16, 16,
34 0, 0, 0,
35 0, 0, 0,
36 0, 0, 0,
37 8, 10, 12,
38 0, 0, 0,
39 0, 0, 0,
40 0, 0, 0,
41 0, 0, 0,
42 8, 10, 12,
43};
44
45} // anonymous
46
47CodecMode::Mode
48CodecMode::ModeForBits(int bits)
49{
50 if ((bits >= 0x00 && bits <= 0x05) || (bits >= 0x07 && bits <= 0x09) || bits == 0x0d)
51 {
52 return static_cast<Mode>(bits);
53 }
54 throw std::invalid_argument("Invalid mode");
55}
56
57int
58CodecMode::CharacterCountBits(Mode mode, const Version& version)
59{
60 int number = version.versionNumber();
61 int offset;
62 if (number <= 9) {
63 offset = 0;
64 }
65 else if (number <= 26) {
66 offset = 1;
67 }
68 else {
69 offset = 2;
70 }
71 return CHAR_COUNT_PER_MODE[static_cast<int>(mode) * 3 + offset];
72}
73
74} // QRCode
75} // ZXing
